Sentence: Dumbledore leaves Harry with an explanatory note in a basket in front of the Dursley home
Ten years later, the Dursley household is dominated by the Dursleys' son, Dudley, who torments and bullies Harry
Dursley, who tries to keep them from Harry, but the letters keep arriving through every crack in the house
Harry learns that the Dursleys have tried to deny Harry's wizardry all these years
Harry returns to London to spend the summer with the Dursleys
